content.text: Match ends, Burton Albion 0, Liverpool 5.
Second Half ends, Burton Albion 0, Liverpool 5.
Corner,  Burton Albion. Conceded by Joel Matip.
Offside, Liverpool. Jordan Henderson tries a through ball, but Sadio Mané is caught offside.
Divock Origi went off injured after Liverpool had used all subs.
Attempt missed. Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Kevin Stewart.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Divock Origi (Liverpool) because of an injury.
Goal!  Burton Albion 0, Liverpool 5. Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Sadio Mané.
Goal!  Burton Albion 0, Liverpool 4. Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by James Milner.
Corner,  Burton Albion. Conceded by Kevin Stewart.
Matthew Palmer (Burton Albion) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Kevin Stewart (Liverpool).
Hand ball by Ben Fox (Burton Albion).
Attempt missed. Dejan Lovren (Liverpool) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jordan Henderson with a cross following a corner.
Substitution, Liverpool. Kevin Stewart replaces Emre Can because of an injury.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Stephen Bywater.
Attempt saved. Daniel Sturridge (Liverpool) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Georginio Wijnaldum.

Substitution, Liverpool. Georginio Wijnaldum replaces Adam Lallana.
Attempt missed. Lucas Akins (Burton Albion) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Matthew Palmer.
Own Goal by Tom Naylor, Burton Albion.  Burton Albion 0, Liverpool 3.
Attempt missed. Emre Can (Liverpool) header from the left side of the six yard box misses to the right. Assisted by James Milner with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Liverpool. Conceded by Matthew Palmer.
Lee Williamson (Burton Albion) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
